title: Fast English Muffin Pizzas Recipe
description: This English muffin pizza recipe uses your favorite pizza sauce, cheese, and pepperoni to make a quick savory snack or kid-friendly anytime meal!

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Main Dishes Pizza Recipes Fast English Muffin Pizzas 4.7 (328) 271 Reviews 69 Photos This English muffin pizza recipe is very fast and very kid-friendly — they can make them with pizza sauce, cheese, and their choice of topping, and all you have to do is bake them! Submitted by RHONDA35 Updated on June 18, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 69 69 69 69 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 10 mins Total Time: 20 mins Servings: 4 Yield: 8 pizzas Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings 4 English muffins, split ½ cup canned pizza sauce 2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese 16 slices pepperoni sausage Directions Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Arrange the English muffin halves cut-side up on a baking sheet. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Spread pizza sauce evenly on top of each one. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese and top with pepperoni slices. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and browned on the edges, about 10 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Cook’s Note You can toast the muffins first if you prefer a crispier crust. I Made It Print 553 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 327 Calories 14g Fat 30g Carbs 21g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 4 Calories 327 % Daily Value * Total Fat 14g 17% Saturated Fat 7g 36% Cholesterol 45mg 15% Sodium 839mg 36% Total Carbohydrate 30g 11% Dietary Fiber 1g 2% Total Sugars 2g Protein 21g 41% Vitamin C 3mg 3% Calcium 554mg 43% Iron 1mg 7% Potassium 70mg 1% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Fast English Muffin Pizzas 01 of 69 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 69 Photo by  Shynnee 02/16/2025 A keeper! I used mini naan because I did not have English muffins they look and taste amazing 03 of 69 Photo by  countrycook 01/27/2024 These English muffin pizzas are fast and easy to make. I do toast the English muffins lightly before baking. I also heat the pizza sauce (I prefer Classico) in the microwave before ladling on the pizzas, as it helps the cheese to melt faster in the oven. I use sliced mozzarella and whatever toppings I have on hand. I then bake for 15 to 20 mins. in a 350-degree oven, rotating the pan midway through cooking time to ensure the cheese melts evenly. After baking, I sprinkle the pizzas with a little salt, pepper and red pepper flakes for a little extra zing. 04 of 69 Photo by  Allie Goodwin-Brandon 07/28/2022 We made plain cheese. I wish the muffins were more toasty. Other than that not bad for a quick dinner. 05 of 69 Photo by  FunkyLox5983 06/23/2022 Quick and yummy!! 06 of 69 Photo by  Christine Ott 04/10/2021 Absolute awesomeness! Just don't forget to toast the halves before you put whatever toppings are your favorite on it.. mistake not to toast, soggy if you don't.. 07 of 69 Photo by  Femali 03/28/2021 08 of 69 Photo by  Anita Rider 11/16/2020 09 of 69 Photo by  Marishka Brown 11/08/2020 10 of 69 Photo by  Marishka Brown 11/08/2020 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Pizza Cupcakes 14 Ratings Pizza Pinwheels 765 Ratings Upside-Down Pizza 9 Ratings Grandma's Homemade Pizza ala 'Da Boys' 13 Ratings BBQ Pork Pizza 38 Ratings Cheesy Pepperoni Pizza Rolls 8 Ratings Pizza Buns 47 Ratings Authentic Pizza Margherita 41 Ratings Pumpkin Hummus, Caramelized Onion and Fontina Cheese Pizzas 14 Ratings Individual Grilled Veggie Pizzas 5 Ratings Deep-Dish Cast Iron Pizza 74 Ratings True Cheeseburger Pizza 47 Ratings Reuben Pizza 122 Ratings Party Pizzas 4 Ratings Personal Portobello Pizza 180 Ratings D's Taco Pizza 54 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
